speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I would like to announce that the Committee on Indian Affairs will meet on Thursday, June 19, at 9:30 a.m. in room 562 of the Dirksen Senate Office Building to conduct a business meeting to consider pending legislative issues, to be followed immediately by a hearing to receive comments on a discussion draft bill to address law and order in Indian Country.
Those wishing additional information may contact the Indian Affairs Committee at 224-2251.
